title: Whiteboard Friday - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Rejoice Ojiaku August 25, 2023 Map Your Keywords to the Buyer's Journey and User Intent — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Keyword Research Rejoice takes you through how to map your keywords to both the buyer’s purchasing journey and the relative user intent. Read this post By: Jon Earnshaw August 18, 2023 Identifying, Fixing, and Preventing Cannibalization — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Keyword Research In this Whiteboard Friday, Jon discusses how to identify, fix, and prevent cannibalization. He identifies three specific types of cannibalization: internal, international, and subdomain. Read this post By: Kavi Kardos August 11, 2023 Site Architecture for Resource & Content Libraries — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Content Marketing Kavi outlines a four-step process for building resource and content libraries. The process includes auditing for technical and content-related issues, mapping out a new structure, migrating the content with redirects, and redesigning the site to match the new structure. Read this post By: Areej AbuAli August 4, 2023 Site Architecture Optimization for Seasonality — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Technical SEO Areej discusses site architecture optimization for seasonality in this edition of Whiteboard Friday. The key focus is on asking yourself when your business’s peak periods occur and strategically planning before, during, and after those periods. Read this post By: Lazarina Stoy July 28, 2023 Data Storytelling: Skills and Elements — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | SEO Analytics Join Lazarina in this Whiteboard Friday where she discusses the critical skills and elements involved in data storytelling. Learn about data analysis, and data visualization, as well as how to communicate wins and balance relationships with stakeholders. Read this post By: Helen Pollitt July 21, 2023 How SEOs and UX Designers Can Work Better Together — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | User Experience (UX) There are a lot of similarities between SEOs and UX designers, and we often have the same goals. How can we work to understand more of the UX designers' priorities and help to communicate our priorities to them? Learn all about how SEOs and UX designers can work better together in this edition of Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Helen Pollitt July 14, 2023 How SEOs and Content Writers Can Work Better Together — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Content Marketing Learn all about how SEOs and content writers can work better together. By working more closely and more effectively, you can create great content that ultimately converts and drives traffic. Read this post By: Helen Pollitt July 7, 2023 How SEOs and Developers Can Work Better Together — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Marketing Industry SEOs and developers need to work better together. Understand how to communicate with each other in a way that fits into each other’s processes. By doing so, you can safeguard your organic traffic while also safeguarding your entire website. Read this post By: Azeem Ahmad June 30, 2023 Diversify Your Content Strategy — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Content Marketing Go from basic to a more advanced content strategy with Azeem in this Whiteboard Friday episode. Diversify your content strategy by creating the right content for your audience at the right time. Read this post By: Amanda Jordan June 23, 2023 How to Create Kick-Ass Local Landing Pages — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Local SEO Learn all about how to create kick-ass local landing pages in this Whiteboard Friday with Amanda Jordan. Discover the most popular features and get to know the dos and don'ts when creating local landing pages. Read this post By: Lidia Infante June 16, 2023 How TikTok Is Reading Your Mind — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Social Media Explore the role of demographics, engagement, and personalized recommendations in how TikTok surfaces content. Discover how TikTok attempts to avoid echo chambers and gain valuable insights into its inner workings. Dive into the fascinating world of TikTok's algorithm in this new Whiteboard Friday episode with Lidia Infante! Read this post By: Larry Waddell June 9, 2023 How to Explain the Value of SEO to Executives — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Marketing Industry | SEO Consulting In today’s episode of Whiteboard Friday, Seer Interactive’s Larry Waddell discusses how you can translate the SEO work you do for your clients into how executives think of value — specifically, business value. Read this post By: Greg Gifford June 2, 2023 Easy to Implement Tactics for Local Link Building — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Local SEO | Link Building Google’s local algorithm demands different tactics for link building. And even if you don't need local SEO, local link building strategies can still give you a different perspective and improve your work. In today’s episode, Greg walks you through some easy to implement local SEO tactics. Read this post By: Aleyda Solis May 26, 2023 The Ultimate Low-Hanging Fruit SEO Strategy — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | SEO Basics We all know that we want to maximize our chances for success in SEO, and for that, what we want to do is prioritize tasks that will have a higher impact, and lower effort, but sometimes those get lost in the SEO audit process. In today’s Whiteboard Friday, Aleyda helps develop this low-hanging fruit analysis in parallel of the usual SEO process. Read this post
